message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $14000. This is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14000 is still a little too high for me. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $12500. This is a fair price for both of us and will allow us to finalize this deal.
